item.title: How This Site Works
item.description:
I created this site with Hugo. It is running using GitHub pages, with my custom domain mapped to it.

The theme I am using is called Cleanwhite

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
After letting my old Technosophos site languish for a decade, I decided to start afresh.

For many years I ran a site called technosophos.com that had tips and tricks that I had learned along my engineering journey. I stopped updating the blog soon after Microsoft acquired Deis. When I left Microsoft to start Fermyon, I did most of my blogging on Fermyon itself (though some of those were reposted to Dev.to).

About Me

Matt Butcher is a developer, entrepeneur, writer, and speaker.

Matt co-founded Fermyon Technologies in 2021 (acquired by Akamai). A venture-backed company, Fermyon built a new generation of serverless computing powered by WebAssembly.

He has authored eight books. He is active in the open source cloud native world, having created the Illustrated Children’s Guide to Kubernetes series. He created the Helm package manager for Kubernetes as well as many other open source tools.
